step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your fingers closed into fists and draw your arms in front of your chest, tightening your muscles as you inhale.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles as you move outwards.
Great job returning to the starting position. Ensure your fingers are fisted and muscles are tight as you inhale.
Excellent outward movement. Keep opening your fingers and extending arms to shoulder height while exhaling and relaxing.
You're doing well with the horizontal pumping motion. Focus on maintaining relaxed muscles during the outward phase.
Second rep starting strong! Remember to close your fingers into fists and tighten muscles as you inhale.
Good execution of the outward movement. Continue to exhale and relax your muscles as you extend your arms.
Well done returning to the start. Keep those fists tight and inhale as you bring your arms in.
Excellent outward extension. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles fully as your arms move horizontally.
Great job completing the second set! You're effectively promoting lymph drainage with this exercise.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to focus on fisting your hands and tightening muscles as you inhale, then opening your hands and relaxing as you exhale and extend your arms. Keep up the good work!
